suggestions.original: To enhance the line texture in the artwork, consider incorporating a greater variety of line thicknesses and styles. Introduce finer, more intricate lines alongside the bold ones to add depth and complexity. Experiment with different techniques such as cross-hatching, stippling, or using different tools to create varied textures. This will make the piece more dynamic and visually engaging.
